I

IAuthService - Interface in interfaces
The IAuthService interface defines a contract for managing authentication services, such as login and logout.
ICampCommitteeService - Interface in interfaces
The ICampCommitteeService interface defines methods for camp committee camp-related operations.
ICampStaffService - Interface in interfaces
The ICampStaffService interface defines a contract for managing staff-related camp services.
ICampStudentService - Interface in interfaces
The ICampStudentService interface defines methods for retrieving information about camps and managing a student's participation in camps.
ICampUpdateService - Interface in interfaces
The ICampUpdateService interface defines methods for updating camp information.
ICampValidationService - Interface in interfaces
The ICampValidationService interface defines methods for validating criterions for camp-related operations.
IEnquiryResponderService - Interface in interfaces
The IEnquiryResponderService interface defines methods for pertaining to the response to camp-related enquiries.
IEnquirySenderService - Interface in interfaces
The IEnquirySenderService interface defines methods for managing the creation, editing, and deletion of enquiries by a student, as well as retrieving responded, submitted, and draft enquiries.
IFileDataService - Interface in interfaces
The IFileDataService interface defines methods for importing data related to students and staff from specified file paths to the login detail .csv files.
IMenuView - Interface in interfaces
The IMenuView interface defines a contract for displaying main menu options.
importStaffData(String) - Method in interface interfaces.IFileDataService
Imports Staff data from the specified file paths.
importStaffData(String) - Method in class services.CsvFileDataService
Imports staff data from a CSV file, creates Staff objects, and stores them in a map.
importStudentData(String) - Method in interface interfaces.IFileDataService
Imports student data from the specified file paths.
importStudentData(String) - Method in class services.CsvFileDataService
Imports student data from a CSV file, creates Student objects, and stores them in a map.
incrementStudentPoints() - Method in class models.Student
Increments the number of points earned by the student.
initDataStore(IFileDataService, Map<String, String>) - Static method in class stores.DataStore
Initializes the DataStore with the provided file data service and file paths.
InputSelectionUtility - Class in utility
The InputSelectionUtility class provides utility and helper methods for handling input of various forms.

interfaces - package interfaces
 
IReportStaffService - Interface in interfaces
The IReportStaffService interface defines methods for staff for generating various reports types related to camps.
IReportStudentService - Interface in interfaces
The IReportStudentService interface defines method(s) for students who are camp committee members for generating report of a camp.
isCampCommitteeFull(Camp) - Method in interface interfaces.ICampValidationService
Checks if the camp committee for the specified camp is full.
isCampCommitteeFull(Camp) - Method in class services.CampValidationService
Checks if the camp committee slots are full by comparing the number of registered committee members with the maximum allowed committee slots.
isCampFull(Camp) - Method in interface interfaces.ICampValidationService
Checks if the specified camp is full.
isCampFull(Camp) - Method in class services.CampValidationService
Checks if the Camp is full by comparing the number of registered students with the maximum allowed slots.
isCampOver(Date, Camp) - Method in interface interfaces.ICampValidationService
Checks if the specified camp is over based on the current date.
isCampOver(Date, Camp) - Method in class services.CampValidationService
Checks if the Camp is over based on the current date and the Camp's registration closing date.
isCampRegistered(Camp) - Method in interface interfaces.ICampValidationService
Checks if the specified camp is registered.
isCampRegistered(Camp) - Method in class services.CampValidationService
Checks if a camp is registered by students or camp committees.
isLoggedIn() - Static method in class stores.AuthStore
Checks if the user is logged in.
ISuggestionResponderService - Interface in interfaces
The ISuggestionResponderService interface defines methods for responding to suggestions related to a specific camp.
ISuggestionSenderService - Interface in interfaces
The ISuggestionSenderService interface defines methods for managing suggestions sent by a student.
isUserCampCommittee(Student) - Method in interface interfaces.ICampValidationService
Checks if the specified student is part of any camp committee.
isUserCampCommittee(Student) - Method in class services.CampValidationService
Checks if the Student is a camp committee member for any Camp.
isUserCampCommitteeForCamp(Student, Camp) - Method in interface interfaces.ICampValidationService
Checks if the specified student is part of the camp committee for the given camp.
isUserCampCommitteeForCamp(Student, Camp) - Method in class services.CampValidationService
Checks if the Student is the camp committee member for the specified camp.
isUserRegisteredWithCamp(Student, Camp) - Method in interface interfaces.ICampValidationService
Checks if the specified student is registered for the given camp.
isUserRegisteredWithCamp(Student, Camp) - Method in class services.CampValidationService
Checks if the Student is registered with the specified Camp.
isUserWithdrawnFromCamp(Student, Camp) - Method in interface interfaces.ICampValidationService
Checks if the specified student has withdrawn from the given camp.
isUserWithdrawnFromCamp(Student, Camp) - Method in class services.CampValidationService
Checks if the Student has withdrawn from the specified Camp.
isValidName(List<Camp>, String) - Method in interface interfaces.ICampValidationService
Checks if the specified camp name is valid, i.e., not already used by existing camps.
isValidName(List<Camp>, String) - Method in class services.CampValidationService
Checks if a camp name is unique among existing camps.
IUserMenuView - Interface in interfaces
The IUserMenuView interface defines a contract for the user main menu options and relevant views it requires.
IUserService - Interface in interfaces
The IUserService interface defines a contract for user services.
